content: At the last WGM it was announced by IHE (in the meeting for reviewing the IPS Ballot) that a connectathon track was supposed to be scheduled about the IPS in Sydney. Does anyone know more about it? HL7 Germany would highly be interested in testing their national profiles which heavily rely on the IPS, especially mapping to other profiles that are derived from the IPS. Is anything planned for the IPS?

@Alexander Zautke I am a bit behind in submitting track proposals, but I'm still planning to do that today (discussed with Sandy Vance this morning). If you have some specifics that you would like to have including in the IPS track submission send it to me as soon as you can.

The IPS Track proposal for the Sydney Connectathon has been posted here. Comments and suggestions for further updates are welcome. There will be an opportunity for review and discussion on the IPS call today at 11:00 AM Eastern / 16:00 UTC.
@Rob Hausam Do you have a link for the meeting information?
Found it, din't know that you need to log-in

At the last WGM it was announced by IHE (in the meeting for reviewing the IPS Ballot) that a connectathon track was supposed to be scheduled about the IPS in Sydney. Does anyone know more about it? HL7 Germany would highly be interested in testing their national profiles which heavily rely on the IPS, especially mapping to other profiles that are derived from the IPS.

Happy to hear this from you !
@Giorgio Cangioli @Rob Hausam What are you plans regarding IPS calls in January? I would have a couple of smaller issues to discuss.
Hi @Alexander Zautke , the next IPS call is scheduled for Wed Jan 8th. If you can summarize the issues to be discussed I'll add to the agenda.
Ah, perfect! Some issues around Observation.effective[x] in combination with the ips-1 constraint. As well, as a follow-up question about JIRA Ticket FHIR-23906.
